Crypto Description: Static website for my cryptocurrency business project. Custom UX and logo design.
VA Description:
This web application contains tools related to productivity and grappling martial arts - specifically for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.
 
 I am the author of the whole idea, functionalities 
as well as the creator of the logo and name, I created the UX and UI using Bootstrap, JavaScript and HTMX, as well as the database logic and backend in Django.
The project serves me and the people in the club. The application is open-source and remains in beta as of 05/06/2023. 
The application contains a lot of functionality and is divided into several modules:

(a) Clubs 
- Club members (profiles of other people and permission manager)
- Club schedule (generator)
- Club workouts  
- List of clubs, any user can ask a club (authorized members) to join it 

b) BJJournal (Brazilian Jiu - Jitsu Journal)
- Statistics
- Add a training session (record the type of session, length, techniques learned, etc.).
- Your training sessions (list all sessions, where the user can edit or delete each session)
- Open techniques database (where any user can add a Jiu Jitsu technique (name, type, etc.) and add Suggestions to other techniques)
- A simple to do application, where the user can add a list, and to-do items in each list.

(c) Notifications)
- Notify eligible members of applications

d) Account / Profile (Account / Profile)
- Manage account (change password / email) and profile (personal information (optional) - user avatar, belt, bio etc).
Portfolio Description: My personal page :) Project made with React / NextJS.
